sqlMap.sql:
select ed.ENTITY_DEFAULT_ID, ed.DEFAULT_VALUE, ed.CONDITION_EXP, ed.ENTITY_FIELD_NAME, ed.ENTITY_TYPE, ed.SITE_NAME as ENTITY_DEF_SITE_NAME,
from ENTITY_DEFAULT ed
sqlMap.select:
left outer join SECTION_DEFINITION sd on ed.SECTION_DEFINITION_ID = sd.SECTION_DEFINITION_ID AND sd.SECTION_DEFINITION_ID = #sectionDefinition.id#
where (ed.SITE_NAME = #siteName# or ed.SITE_NAME is null)
ENTITY_TYPE = #entityType#
AND ed.ENTITY_FIELD_NAME = #entityFieldName#
order by ENTITY_FIELD_NAME, ENTITY_TYPE, ed.SITE_NAME desc, SECTION_DEFINITION_ID desc

left outer join SECTION_DEFINITION sd on ed.SECTION_DEFINITION_ID = sd.SECTION_DEFINITION_ID AND sd.SECTION_DEFINITION_ID = #sectionDefinition.id#
where (ed.SITE_NAME = #siteName# or ed.SITE_NAME is null)
ENTITY_TYPE = #entityType#
order by ENTITY_FIELD_NAME, ENTITY_TYPE, ed.SITE_NAME desc, SECTION_DEFINITION_ID desc
sqlMap.insert:
insert into ENTITY_DEFAULT (DEFAULT_VALUE, CONDITION_EXP, ENTITY_FIELD_NAME, ENTITY_TYPE, SECTION_DEFINITION_ID, SITE_NAME) values (#defaultValue#, #conditionExp#, #entityFieldName#, #entityType#, #sectionDefinition.id#, #siteName#)
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS value
sqlMap.update: update ENTITY_DEFAULT SET DEFAULT_VALUE = #defaultValue#, CONDITION_EXP = #conditionExp#, ENTITY_FIELD_NAME = #entityFieldName#, ENTITY_TYPE = #entityType#, SECTION_DEFINITION_ID = #sectionDefinition.id#, SITE_NAME = #siteName# where ENTITY_DEFAULT_ID = #id:BIGINT#
